recipe.title: Six-Spice Hanger Steak
ingredients: 1 hanger steak (about 2 pounds and 1 1/2 inches thick), center gristle removed
instructions: Makes steaks: Preheat broiler and lightly oil rack of broiler pan. Finely grind spices with brown sugar and 11/2 tsp salt in grinder. Pat steak dry, then sprinkle evenly with spice mixture and rub into meat. Broil steak 2 to 3 inches from heat, turning once, 7 to 12 minutes for medium-rare. Let steak rest on a plate at least 10 minutes.
